message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you get a quarter, it's a good starting point
I'll take a slight lead, but still a fair share for you!
I'll take most of it, you get a small share, but it's still better than nothing
I'll take a bigger lead, but still a decent share for you!
I'll give you everything, but I'm not getting anything, it's a generous offer
